data.title: I miss my Mort Goldman character audio
data.meta_description: When I had it. I hated it. but now I miss it. #ningaaudionerf
data.text:
There was a time when you could select a audio template for your character that had the voice actor for Mort Goldman from Family Guy. Seems a lot of ppl that got that template, COMPLAINED. and it got patched.

Only parts of the template was audio from Mort, best was the fall, YELL.

My only male character's voice sounds.. I don't know.. sometimes like a 12-year old, sometimes like Kermit, sometimes more normal. Not sure why it's so extremely different for different actions, but I wish THIS one got patched as well. It's kinda embarrassing when I jump/fall down somewhere and he sounds like Tarzan at age 12 lol

Venus Ocean - Breton Sorceress VR16, EP, Tamriel Hero | Gixia - Breton Sorceress VR16, EP, Tamriel Hero

Frances Demnevanni - Breton Dragonknight VR16, EP, Tamriel Hero | Raygee - Breton Nightblade VR16, EP, Tamriel Hero

Lady Olivieri - Breton Nightblade VR16, EP, Tamriel Hero | Donna Demnevanni - Breton Templar VR16, DC, Tamriel Hero

Elaine Benes - Breton Templar VR16, EP | Ray McCluck - Breton Sorcerer VR16, EP

Moonshadow Demnevanni - Dunmer Dragonknight Lvl 50, EP | Jamie Stacey - Redguard Templar Lvl 50, EP

Caia Cosades - Imperial Nightblade, EP
